LanguageData.Miho_Thunder_Hediff.label: Electric shock
LanguageData.Miho_Thunder_Hediff.description: With a special charge using mechanites, both Mechanoids and humans are equally electrocuted.
LanguageData.Miho_Hawk_Hediff.label: Preyed
LanguageData.Miho_Abomi_Hediff.label: Disgust
LanguageData.Miho_Abomi_Hediff.description: I feel a kind of disgust that words cannot describe.
LanguageData.Miho_AbomiSeen_Hediff.label: Witnessed "That"
LanguageData.Miho_AbomiSeen_Hediff.description: I have a feeling of disgust I have never experienced before.
